# File lib/ext_arr.rb, line 376
  def each(&block) # :yield: item

    pos = nil
    index.each do |entry|
      # only set io position if necessary

      unless pos == entry[pos_index]
        pos = entry[pos_index]
        io.pos = pos
      end
      
      pos += entry[length_index]
      
      # yield entry

      yield str_to_entry( io.read(entry[length_index]) )
    end
    self
  end
